column1: narrow ship corridor with exposed wiring and flickering panels
observation deck overlooking starfield through scratched viewing glass
cargo bay stacked with rusted crates and leaking canisters
maintenance tunnel lit by sporadic emergency strips
engine room humming with unstable reactor glow
cramped pilot cabin cluttered with analog switches and dials
bridge with mismatched chairs and outdated consoles
airlock chamber with worn hazard markings and scuffed floor
medbay with cracked monitors and improvised equipment racks
dim hangar bay holding one half-rebuilt shuttle
galley mess deck with bolted tables and loose fixtures
crew quarters lined with bunks and hanging storage nets
storm-battered landing pad on wind-scoured outpost
desolate basalt plain under swollen red sky
abandoned mining site with half-buried machinery
crater rim camp surrounded by jagged rock spires
salt-flat valley reflecting faint distant nebula light
derelict colony street with darkened prefab shelters
radio tower hilltop overlooking silent settlement ruins
dry riverbed cutting through glassified black sand dunes
collapsed observatory dome open to toxic sky
ash-covered forest of petrified metallic trees
fractured moon surface with exposed glowing fault lines
acid mist swamp dotted with sinking structures
orbital junk field visible low in diseased sky
ancient monolith field half-consumed by drifting dust
shoreline of tar-black sea with sluggish waves
faint-lit maintenance bay deep inside asteroid station
underground transit tunnel with stalled tram and dead lights
industrial refinery yard full of idle skeletal frames
